summary: "Scott Pilgrim vs. the World" is a 2010 funny action movie directed by Edgar Wright. It's based on the graphic novels by Bryan Lee O'Malley. Michael Cera plays Scott Pilgrim, a musician who falls for Ramona Flowers (Mary Elizabeth Winstead). To be with her, he must fight her seven evil ex-boyfriends. The film is set in Toronto and has a video game feel. Despite not making back its budget, it got good reviews and has a big fan base. It's known for its cool effects and funny moments.
title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
